ee.sk.digidoc
Class IncludeInfo

java.lang.Object
  ee.sk.digidoc.IncludeInfo

public class IncludeInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Models the ETSI element Holds info about source of data used to calculate timestamp hash. Such elements will be serialized as part of a timestamp element.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Veiko Sinivee
